name: Lashes Lifting Neutralising Lotion Sachets 1,5ml 10pcs
short_description: Phi Lashes Lifting Neutralising Lotion Sachets are a neutralizing fix cream, being a crucial step in the lash lifting process in order to lock everything in and achieve the desired look.
long_description: Â It helps lashes separating and setting on place after the lifting cream application, preventing any lash hairs damages which may be caused by the lash perming.
